message: Let's make a deal! I take $7,000, you take $3,000.  It's best to settle now, as the value decreases over time.
I understand the time pressure, but a 60/40 split seems fairer given the circumstances.
Bob, time is running out! This offer is a compromise, and it's better than what we'll get in the next round. Let's close the deal.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than I would accept myself just to end this. Take the deal!
